bitfield.description: Suspend signal selection. [[br]]Selects which suspend signal affects the peripheral. [[br]]Only valid when Suspend_Default_Override=0 and SensCtrl=1. [[br]]When read, these bits reflect the default suspend signal. [[br]]0000b: Cortex-A9 suspend signal. [[br]]All other values are reserved.

Enable or disable the override value in Suspend_Sel. [[br]]0: Suspend_Sel field will select which suspend signal reaches the peripheral. [[br]]1: Suspend_Sel field ignored. [[br]]Default suspend signal will reach the peripheral.

Sensitivity Control for suspend signals. [[br]]When Suspend_Default_Override=1, this bit is ignored and read as a 1. [[br]]When Suspend_Default_Override=0, [[br]]0: Suspend signal will not reach the peripheral. [[br]]Peripheral will act as normal even during a debug halt. [[br]]1: Suspend signal will reach the peripheral. [[br]]Peripheral will be suspended during debug halt.

Suspend signal selection. [[br]]Selects which suspend signal affects the peripheral. [[br]]Only valid when Suspend_Default_Override=0 and SensCtrl=1. [[br]]When read, these bits reflect the default suspend signal. [[br]]0000b: Cortex-A9 suspend signal. [[br]]All other values are reserved.

Enable or disable the override value in Suspend_Sel. [[br]]0: Suspend_Sel field will select which suspend signal reaches the peripheral. [[br]]1: Suspend_Sel field ignored. [[br]]Default suspend signal will reach the peripheral.

Sensitivity Control for suspend signals. [[br]]When Suspend_Default_Override=1, this bit is ignored and read as a 1. [[br]]When Suspend_Default_Override=0, [[br]]0: Suspend signal will not reach the peripheral. [[br]]Peripheral will act as normal even during a debug halt. [[br]]1: Suspend signal will reach the peripheral. [[br]]Peripheral will be suspended during debug halt.
